body:
We've had issues (#14605, [636](https://github.com/hpc/charliecloud/pull/636)) with our spack builder variant. In short, you simply couldn't install Charliecloud with said variant.

To reduce Charliecloud dependencies and simplify packaging we replaced `skopeo` and `umoci` functionality with a native python3 script, [ch-tug](https://github.com/hpc/charliecloud/pull/616).

We'd like to remove the builder variant completely. Charliecloud 0.13 (unsupported) was the last release depending on skopeo and umoci, thus this PR removes it completely.
title: add charliecloud/0.14; remove umoci/skopeo; remove builder variant
